TextLang.Text: OK
Yes
No
Quit Game
Return to Game
To perform this operation, you must quit [%1]. Do you want to quit the software now?
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. To perform this operation, at least %1 more free space is needed.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. At least %1 more free space is needed.
A file with the same name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
Please wait...
Cancelling... Please wait.
An error has occurred.
The data is corrupted.
The data type is not supported.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk.
The hard disk cannot be accessed.
The Internet connection is disabled. Go to [Settings] > [Network Settings] and enable Internet connection.
A connection to the network could not be established. Go to [Settings] > [Network Settings] and check your settings.
You must sign in to PlayStation®Network.
You must sign up for PlayStation®Network.
Sign in to PlayStation®Network.
The content is not available before the start date.
The content has expired and is no longer available.
This content has a time limit. To perform this operation, go to [Settings] > [Date and Time Settings] > [Date and Time], and then select [Set via Internet] to set the time and date.
This content cannot currently be used on this system. This content will be available for use after 24 hours have passed from the time it was used on another PS3™ system.
This content cannot be accessed on your account.
The maximum number of themes that can be installed has been reached. To install this theme, you must delete an existing theme.
An Ethernet cable is not connected.
Game Quit: No Request Event
The copyright protection information is invalid.
Proceed to PlayStation®Store
This game cannot be started unless it is installed on the hard disk. Do you want to start installing?
This game cannot be started unless it is installed on the hard disk. To install on the hard disk you must create a game partition of %1. Do you want to start installing?
Install completed. Press the %e button to restart.
This game cannot be started unless it is installed on the hard disk.

This game is compatible with the hard disk. To install on the hard disk you must create a game partition of %1. It will take approximately %2 minutes for this to be completed. Do you want to create the game partition?
Creating game partition... Please wait.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. To install, at least %1 more free space is needed.
To save data, you must create an internal memory card on the hard disk. Do you want to create it now?
Create an internal memory card (PS) from [Create New Internal Memory Card] on the next screen, and then start the game again.
Create an internal memory card (PS2) from [Create New Internal Memory Card] on the next screen, and then start the game again.
To save data, go to [Memory Card Utility] > [Create New Internal Memory Card] and create an internal memory card (PS).
To save data, go to [Memory Card Utility] > [Create New Internal Memory Card] and create an internal memory card (PS2).
Before saving new saved data, go to [Memory Card Utility] > [Create New Internal Memory Card] and create an internal memory card (PS).
Before saving new saved data, go to [Memory Card Utility] > [Create New Internal Memory Card] and create an internal memory card (PS2).
The game partition cannot be created. Go to [PlayStation®Store] and download [PS2 System Data].

To play this game, you must create an additional game partition of %1. Do you want to create the game partition?
It will take approximately %2 minutes for this operation to be completed. If you select [No], you will not be able to start the game.
The game partition for this game cannot be created because the installed game is corrupted. To perform this operation, delete the game, and then reinstall the game using the disc.
This content can be used if you renew the license/licence in PlayStation®Store.
This software cannot be started due to region restrictions.
This disc cannot be started.
This game is not supported.
An error occurred during the start operation.
The installed game is corrupted and cannot be started. You must delete the installed game and then reinstall it.
The installed game is corrupted and cannot be started.
This game has not been installed completely. Use the disc to install the game.

This title is not currently compatible with the PS3™ system. Please visit faq.eu.playstation.com/bc for a list of PlayStation®2 format software titles that are compatible, and to update the System Software that will enable your PS3™ system to play additional PlayStation®2 format software titles.

This title is not currently compatible with the PS3™ system. If you update your system software the title may become compatible with your system. Please visit http://www.us.playstation.com/Support/CompatibleStatus to check whether a specific PlayStation®2 format software title is compatible with the PS3™ system.

This title is not currently compatible with the PS3™ system. If you update your system software the title may become compatible with your system. Please visit http://www.jp.playstation.com/ps3/status/ to check whether a specific PlayStation®2 format software title is compatible with the PS3™ system.

This title is not currently compatible with the PS3™ system. If you update your system software the title may become compatible with your system. Please visit http://www.playstation.co.kr/info/bc to check whether a specific PlayStation®2 format software title is compatible with the PS3™ system.

This title is not currently compatible with the PS3™ system. If you update your system software the title may become compatible with your system. Please visit http://asia.playstation.com/status to check whether a specific PlayStation®2 format software title is compatible with the PS3™ system.
You cannot play this game at the current video output setting.
A problem has occurred. This PlayStation®2 format software was forced to quit.
To play this game, you must insert the following disc. Insert the disc, and then start the game again.
The system software of your PS3™ system is version %1. To start, you must update to version %2 or later. Do you want to update now?
You will need to update the system software before your next use.
Always wear the strap. Hold controller firmly to prevent slipping.
Tighten strap with strap lock.
Hold other controller firmly.
Allow enough space for safe use.
Set to wide angle view.
Place camera in a central position.

Some people may experience discomfort (such as eye strain, eye fatigue or nausea) while watching 3D video images or playing stereoscopic 3D games on 3D televisions. If you experience such discomfort, you should immediately discontinue use of your television until the discomfort subsides.

SCE recommends that all viewers take regular breaks while watching 3D video, or playing stereoscopic 3D games. The length and frequency of necessary breaks may vary from person to person. Please take breaks that are long enough to allow any feelings of discomfort to subside. If symptoms persist, consult your doctor.

The vision of young children (especially those under six years old) is still under development. SCE recommends that you consult your doctor (such as a pediatrician or eye doctor) before allowing young children to watch 3D video images or play stereoscopic 3D games. Adults should supervise young children to ensure they follow the recommendations listed above.
Please refer to our website (http://www.scei.co.jp/3D-support/) for the latest information.
There is no update history.
To play the game you have been invited to join, insert the following disc, and then select [OK].
To play the game you have been invited to join, you must have the following game:
To use this data, you must have the following game:
To use this data, insert the following disc, and then select [OK].
The installed game will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
There is no game data.
An error occurred during game data creation.
The latest update data has been found. The system will quit this software and start installing.
The latest update data for this software has been found. To sign in and use this software, you must update the software to the latest version. The system will quit the software and start installing.
To use this software, you must update the system software. The system will quit this software and start a system software update.
Downloading the latest update data... It is recommended that you use this software after the download is completed. To check the status of the download, go to [Network] > [Download Management].
The game data is corrupted.
The game data is corrupted. The game will close. You must delete the game data to play this game.
The installed game is corrupted. The game will close. You must delete the installed game and then reinstall it to play this game.
Installing... Please wait.
An error occurred during the install operation.
This content cannot be used during remote play.
You must sign up for PlayStation®Network. Do you want to sign up now?
To access this content, you must activate this system. Go to [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management] to activate this system.
The activation information is invalid. Go to [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management] to activate this system.
Do you want to cancel?
A system software update is required. Go to [Settings] > [System Update] and perform the update.
The latest update data was found.
Version
Checking for update data... Please wait.
The server may currently be down for maintenance or updating. Try again later.
